body: The manufacturing of a president in Cote d’Ivoire: "The current deadlock in Cote d’Ivoire stems from the massive fraud that the electronic tally-ups revealed from the votes in the areas of the country still under the control of the armed rebellion."
original_body: The manufacturing of a president in Cote d’Ivoire: "The current deadlock in Cote d’Ivoire stems from the massive fraud that the electronic tally-ups revealed from the votes in the areas of the country still under the control of the armed rebellion."
title: Cote d’Ivoire: Manufacturing a president

sentence: The manufacturing of a president in Cote d’Ivoire: "The current deadlock in Cote d’Ivoire stems from the massive fraud that the electronic tally-ups revealed from the votes in the areas of the country still under the control of the armed rebellion."
